original_text:
Diego Wild
Un’antica civiltà ricca di mistero
Uno dei temi più sviluppati e coinvolgenti dai provider è senza dubbio quello avventura/esploratore. Diego Wild è un altro gioco appartenente a questo filone, e come negli altri prodotti similari, anche qui ci troviamo davanti a un lavoro impeccabile dal punto di vista grafico. Lo scenario è naturalmente la foresta amazzonica, con le alte piante che sbucano ai lati della griglia di gioco, disposta all’entrata dell’antico tempio azteco.
I simboli sono ben disegnati e ricchi di dettagli, mentre invece la musica che accompagna gli spin lascia un po’ a desiderare, essendo la classica arcade dei videogiochi. Non che sia un problema, soprattutto per i tanti che preferiscono silenziare il gioco.
Tanti modi per vincere
Una delle caratteristiche già interessanti di Diego Wild è che essendo una slot Superways, i modi per vincere sono ben 243 nel gioco regolare e 3125 nel gioco bonus!
La griglia ha 5 rulli e 3 righe, ma le sue dimensioni aumentano durante i Free Spins. Le scommesse vanno da un minimo di 0,20 € a salire, ma utilizzando il tasto Max Bet si può impostare la scommessa più alta con un solo click. Tra le varie funzioni c’è l’Autoplay, che ci permette di impostare un numero prestabilito di giri automatici. Prima però è necessario scegliere i limiti di vincita o di perdita oltre il quale il gioco si arresterà, a nostro avviso un’ottima funzione che ci permette di giocare senza preoccupazioni.
La volatilità è alta e il ritorno teorico al giocatore è del 96,29%.
Un gioco bonus super
In Diego Wild troviamo diversi simboli, alcuni di basso valore, altri ben più remunerativi. Quelli classici delle carte da gioco hanno tutti lo stesso valore e pagano meno di tutti. A salire troviamo il bracciale, il vaso, la statua e il forziere. Diego è il nostro simbolo Wild e sostituisce tutte le altre icone, eccetto lo Scatter, qua rappresentato dalla mappa. Con tre di questi simboli otteniamo 5 Free games, con 4 simboli i giri gratuiti saranno 10 mentre 5 Scatter ci regalano ben 20 Free Games.
Ai giri gratuiti è legato il gioco bonus, lo scenario si sposterà all’interno del tempio e ci troveremo davanti a una griglia 3×5 con due ulteriori righe bloccate. Ogni qualvolta sui rulli atterrerà il simbolo del medaglione, questo si sposterà sulla posizione libera del rullo corrispondente, sbloccando un simbolo. Inoltre, verrà aggiunto un ulteriore Free Spin.
 
Domande Frequenti

raw_translation.response:
Diego Wild is a slot game based on the theme of adventure and exploration. The graphics are impeccable, with the Amazon forest in the background and detailed symbols on the reels. The soundtrack is not as impressive but can easily be turned off for those who prefer silence while playing.
With 243 ways to win in the base game and 3125 in the bonus game, Diego Wild is a Superways slot game with 5 reels and 3 rows that can expand during Free Spins. The betting range is from a minimum of €0.20 and can be increased using the Max Bet button. The Autoplay feature is available with predetermined limits for wins and losses to play without worries.
The game has high volatility and a theoretical return to player percentage of 96.29%.
The bonus game is triggered by three Scatter symbols represented by a map, and players can win 5, 10, or 20 Free Games. During the bonus game, players can unlock symbols by landing Medallion symbols on the reels and earn additional Free Spins.
Overall, Diego Wild is a thrilling slot game that combines adventure with exciting gameplay, making it an excellent choice for experienced gamblers.

message.content:

raw_translation.response:
Diego Wild
An ancient and mysterious civilization
One of the most developed and engaging themes by providers is undoubtedly the adventure/explorer one. Diego Wild is another game belonging to this genre, and as in other similar products, we are facing an impeccable work from a graphic point of view. The setting is, of course, the Amazon forest, with tall plants popping up on the sides of the game grid, arranged at the entrance to the ancient Aztec temple.
The symbols are well-designed and rich in detail, while the music accompanying the spins leaves a little to be desired, being the classic arcade of video games. Not that it's a problem, especially for those who prefer to mute the game.
Many ways to win
One of the already interesting features of Diego Wild is that being a Superways slot, the ways to win are 243 in the regular game and 3125 in the bonus game!
The grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, but its dimensions increase during the Free Spins. Bets start from a minimum of €0.20 and go up, but by using the Max Bet button, you can set the highest bet with a single click. Among the various functions, there is Autoplay, which allows us to set a predetermined number of automatic spins. However, before doing so, it is necessary to choose the win or loss limits beyond which the game will stop, in our opinion an excellent feature that allows us to play without worries.
The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player is 96.29%.
A super bonus game
In Diego Wild, we find different symbols, some of low value, others much more rewarding. The classic playing card symbols all have the same value and pay less than all the others. Going up we find the bracelet, the vase, the statue, and the chest. Diego is our Wild symbol and replaces all the other icons, except for the Scatter, which is represented by the map. With three of these symbols, we get 5 Free games, with 4 symbols the free spins will be 10, while 5 Scatters will give us 20 Free Games.
The bonus game is linked to the free spins, and the setting will move inside the temple, where we will be in front of a 3×5 grid with two additional blocked rows. Whenever the medallion symbol lands on the reels, it will move to the free position of the corresponding reel, unlocking a symbol. In addition, an additional Free Spin will be added.
 
Frequently Asked Questions

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content: Diego Wild is a Superways slot game that offers 243 ways to win in the regular game and 3125 ways in the bonus game. The grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, which expand during Free Spins. Bets start from a minimum of €0.20, and the Max Bet button allows setting the highest bet with a single click. The game includes an Autoplay function, which allows setting predetermined numbers of automatic spins. A great feature is the possibility of choosing win or loss limits beyond which the game will stop. The game has high volatility, and the theoretical return to player is 96.29%.

response.headline: Graphics and Audio
response.content: The setting of Diego Wild is the Amazon forest, with tall plants on the sides of the game grid arranged at the entrance to an ancient Aztec temple. The game has exceptional graphics, with symbols well-designed and rich in detail. The soundtrack accompanying the game is classic arcade video game music, but it can be muted. Despite the audio not being the main selling point of the game, it still complements the game's themes and graphics.

response.headline: Jackpot and Payouts
response.content: Diego Wild is a slot game with several symbols of various values, from low-value symbols like classic playing cards to high-paying symbols like bracelets, vases, statues, and chests. The game includes a Wild symbol, Diego, which substitutes for all other icons except for the Scatter, represented by the map symbol. The theoretical return to player is 96.29%, and the game has a high volatility level. The maximum payout is 10,000x the stake. The game has no progressive jackpot.

response.headline: Bonus Rounds and Free Spins
response.content: Diego Wild features a bonus game linked to free spins. Players gain free spins by landing three or more Scatter symbols on the reels. Landing three Scatters yields 5 free games, while four Scatters award 10, and five Scatters grant 20 free games. The bonus game is set inside the temple, where a 3x5 grid with two additional blocked rows appears. Whenever the medallion symbol lands on the reels, it moves to the free position on the same reel, unlocking a symbol. An additional free spin will be added, too.

response.headline: Theme and Storyline
response.content: Diego Wild is an adventure/explorer slot game with a theme set in the Amazon forest and an ancient Aztec temple. The game immerses players in a mystical and mysterious world, with symbols that include traditional playing cards, bracelets, vases, statues, and chests, among others. Diego, the wild symbol, adds to the theme and storyline, and players can explore the ancient temple through the bonus rounds and free spins. Overall, Diego Wild offers exciting gameplay and a captivating theme.

response.headline: Gameplay Features
response.content:
Get ready for some wild and exciting gameplay with Diego Wild, a Superways slot game that offers an impressive 243 ways to win in the regular game and a staggering 3125 ways during the bonus round. The grid features 5 reels and 3 rows, but don't let the initial setup fool you. During Free Spins, the grid expands, allowing even more chances to hit those big wins.

For players looking to start slow, bets can be placed as low as €0.20, making Diego Wild an accessible game for all types of players. On the other hand, for high rollers looking to bet big and win big, the Max Bet button allows players to set the highest bet possible with a single click.

Diego Wild offers an Autoplay function, giving players the option to set predetermined numbers of automatic spins. This is a useful feature for those looking to sit back, relax, and let the game do the work for them.

But wait, there's more! One of the game's standout features is the ability to set win and loss limits that, when reached, will automatically stop the game. This is a great tool for players looking to stay within their budget or for those who might get carried away with the excitement of the game.

Be warned, however, that Diego Wild has high volatility, so players should be prepared for some ups and downs along the way. But with a theoretical return to player of 96.29%, the odds are in your favor to hit those big wins and keep the wild ride going!

response.headline: Jackpot and Payouts
response.content:
Prepare yourself for a wild ride with the exciting and adventurous Diego Wild casino slot game! This game has it all, from low-valued playing card symbols to high-paying icons featuring bracelets, vases, statues, and chests. You might even find yourself shouting '¡arriba, arriba!' when you hit a big win!

The game's Wild symbol is no other than the swashbuckling Diego himself! He'll substitute for all the other icons on the reels and potentially help you achieve epic wins. The only symbol that Diego cannot replace is the Map, which is the Scatter symbol of the game.

If you're wondering about your chances of winning big, have no fear! Diego Wild has a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 96.29%, making it a great choice for players looking for high payout percentages. However, don't forget that the game has high volatility, so be prepared for some big swings!

Speaking of big payouts, the maximum you can win on Diego Wild is a whopping 10,000 times your initial stake! That's enough to make anyone break out into a victory dance! Just remember that there is no progressive jackpot on this game, so all the winnings come from regular game symbols.

response.headline: Bonus Rounds and Free Spins
response.content:
Are you ready to hear about the juiciest part of Diego Wild? Of course you are, you eager beaver! Get ready to spin those reels like there's no tomorrow because Diego Wild features a bonus game linked to free spins that will blow your mind.

First, you need to land three or more Scatter symbols on the reels. And let me tell you, landing three of those bad boys will be easier than finding Waldo in a game of hide and seek. Once you've landed them, the real fun begins! Landing three Scatters yields 5 free games, while four Scatters award 10, and five Scatters grant 20 free games. I know, it's almost too good to be true, but trust me, it's happening.

Now, let's talk about this incredible bonus game. It's set inside the temple - it's like Indiana Jones meets slot games! A 3x5 grid with two additional blocked rows appears, creating the perfect setting for you to show off your best loot-grabbing moves. Whenever the medallion symbol lands on the reels, it moves to the free position on the same reel, unlocking a symbol. And guess what? An additional free spin will be added, too! Because who doesn't love extra free stuff?!

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Diego Wild is a Superways slot game that offers 243 ways to win in the regular game and 3125 ways in the bonus game. The grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, which expand during Free Spins. Bets start from a minimum of €0.20, and the Max Bet button allows setting the highest bet with a single click. The game includes an Autoplay function, which allows setting predetermined numbers of automatic spins. A great feature is the possibility of choosing win or loss limits beyond which the game will stop. The game has high volatility, and the theoretical return to player is 96.29%.

Graphics and Audio

The setting of Diego Wild is the Amazon forest, with tall plants on the sides of the game grid arranged at the entrance to an ancient Aztec temple. The game has exceptional graphics, with symbols well-designed and rich in detail. The soundtrack accompanying the game is classic arcade video game music, but it can be muted. Despite the audio not being the main selling point of the game, it still complements the game's themes and graphics.

Jackpot and Payouts

Diego Wild is a slot game with several symbols of various values, from low-value symbols like classic playing cards to high-paying symbols like bracelets, vases, statues, and chests. The game includes a Wild symbol, Diego, which substitutes for all other icons except for the Scatter, represented by the map symbol. The theoretical return to player is 96.29%, and the game has a high volatility level. The maximum payout is 10,000x the stake. The game has no progressive jackpot.

Bonus Rounds and Free Spins

Diego Wild features a bonus game linked to free spins. Players gain free spins by landing three or more Scatter symbols on the reels. Landing three Scatters yields 5 free games, while four Scatters award 10, and five Scatters grant 20 free games. The bonus game is set inside the temple, where a 3x5 grid with two additional blocked rows appears. Whenever the medallion symbol lands on the reels, it moves to the free position on the same reel, unlocking a symbol. An additional free spin will be added, too.

Theme and Storyline

Diego Wild is an adventure/explorer slot game with a theme set in the Amazon forest and an ancient Aztec temple. The game immerses players in a mystical and mysterious world, with symbols that include traditional playing cards, bracelets, vases, statues, and chests, among others. Diego, the wild symbol, adds to the theme and storyline, and players can explore the ancient temple through the bonus rounds and free spins. Overall, Diego Wild offers exciting gameplay and a captivating theme.

Review: Diego Wild
An ancient and mysterious civilization
One of the most developed and engaging themes by providers is undoubtedly the adventure/explorer one. Diego Wild is another game belonging to this genre, and as in other similar products, we are facing an impeccable work from a graphic point of view. The setting is, of course, the Amazon forest, with tall plants popping up on the sides of the game grid, arranged at the entrance to the ancient Aztec temple.
The symbols are well-designed and rich in detail, while the music accompanying the spins leaves a little to be desired, being the classic arcade of video games. Not that it's a problem, especially for those who prefer to mute the game.
Many ways to win
One of the already interesting features of Diego Wild is that being a Superways slot, the ways to win are 243 in the regular game and 3125 in the bonus game!
The grid has 5 reels and 3 rows, but its dimensions increase during the Free Spins. Bets start from a minimum of €0.20 and go up, but by using the Max Bet button, you can set the highest bet with a single click. Among the various functions, there is Autoplay, which allows us to set a predetermined number of automatic spins. However, before doing so, it is necessary to choose the win or loss limits beyond which the game will stop, in our opinion an excellent feature that allows us to play without worries.
The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player is 96.29%.
A super bonus game
In Diego Wild, we find different symbols, some of low value, others much more rewarding. The classic playing card symbols all have the same value and pay less than all the others. Going up we find the bracelet, the vase, the statue, and the chest. Diego is our Wild symbol and replaces all the other icons, except for the Scatter, which is represented by the map. With three of these symbols, we get 5 Free games, with 4 symbols the free spins will be 10, while 5 Scatters will give us 20 Free Games.
The bonus game is linked to the free spins, and the setting will move inside the temple, where we will be in front of a 3×5 grid with two additional blocked rows. Whenever the medallion symbol lands on the reels, it will move to the free position of the corresponding reel, unlocking a symbol. In addition, an additional Free Spin will be added.
 
Frequently Asked Questions

faq.answer: The highest bet in Diego Wild can be set by using the Max Bet button.

dalle-prompt.response:
Could you please provide a detailed prompt for DALLE to create a feature image fitting the game "Diego Wild"?

Prompt: 

- The image should be in cartoon style
- The image should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses
- The Maya warrior should be surrounded by the game symbols, such as the bracelet, the vase, the statue, and the chest
- The background of the image should represent the Amazon forest, with tall plants popping up on the sides of the game grid, arranged at the entrance to the ancient Aztec temple. 
- The colors of the image should be bright and eye-catching to grab the viewer's attention. 

Overall, the feature image should reflect the adventure/explorer theme of the game and convey a sense of excitement and fun. It should also showcase the main character, Diego, as a happy and playful warrior who is ready to embark on a thrilling adventure through the Amazon forest.
